desc.en: Imps are a fey creature, relatives of pixies. They like to play tricks on the denizens of Myzan, usually non-lethal tricks such as tying bootlaces together, messing up campsites, or waking the dragon whose hoard you are stealing while it slumbers.

appr.en: They resemble pixies without wings. Their hair color ranges from many bright colors, in both the males and females of the species. They wear simple clothing usually made of local plant fibers.

hist.en: Imps were originally thought to be taller, thinner pixies. The researcher Alexia Tribka studied them for many years when she discovered one day in an outing to the forests of Knottwood valley that they were indeed different. Unfortunately the Imps thought it was funny to fill her pack with raw meat and tell the local bear population that poor Alexia was a pi√±ata.
